biotools.summary: This tool is designed to calculate nominal significance levels and critical LOD scores depending on the length of the investigated region, number of chromosomes, and the cross-over rate. The global significance level as well as the precision of the calculation have to be specified.

bioschemas.name: silcLOD
bioschemas.summary: This tool is designed to calculate nominal significance levels and critical LOD scores depending on the length of the investigated region, number of chromosomes, and the cross-over rate. The global significance level as well as the precision of the calculation have to be specified.
